dcterms:description: A collection of 56 videos captured with GoPro and Aqua on-board cameras at different sites in the Caribbean sea off the West coast of Barbados near the McGill Bellairs Research Institute. The videos feature a variety of scenery, viewpoints, and lighting and turbidity conditions, covering footage of sand areas, various dead and live coral and diver-robot activity.
dcterms:title: Bellairs Reef dataset

dcterms:creator: D. M. Steinberg
S. B. Williams
O. Pizarro
M. V. Jakuba
dcterms:description: Exclusively top-down stereo camera imagery collected with an AUV at Scott Reef in Western Australia over a 50 by 75 meter full-coverage of the benthos. The dataset includes 9831 RGB images covering areas of dense coral, sand, and transition areas in between.
dcterms:title: Scott Reef 25 dataset
